author: Doug Bostrom
content:
Laughed when I saw this and thought about Rick’s quote of Conrad elsewhere on the blog: “the ship was alright. The problem was the people on it.”

There she is doing alright, all things considered.

author: Rick Spilman
content:
Not too surprisingly, the two women were trashed by the tabloids. I haven’t heard any more about them since.

Woman ‘lost at sea for five months was incompetent sailor and ex-dominatrix’

author: Willy
content: solar panels are stillup. If the bilge is on the solar shoulp be keeping the boat up.

author: Peter Wright
content:
Sea Nymph has gone further abandoned and without the two girls and dog aboard than she did with them.

Whatever happened to them and their story?
